verses.verse: Now <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> with <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H203>On,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6431>Peleth,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> took <S%H3947>men:<s%>

and they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> with <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H7148>called<s%> to the <S%H5712>assembly,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown;<s%>

and they assembled themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7227>them,<s%> "You take too much on <S%H5712>yourself,<s%> since all the congregation are <S%H6918>holy,<s%> everyone of <S%H3068>them,<s%> and Yahweh is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5375>them:<s%> why then lift yourselves up above the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"
When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5307>it,<s%> he fell on his <S%H6440>face:<s%>

and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and to all his <S%H5712>company,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H3045>show<s%> who are <S%H6918>his,<s%> and who is holy, and will cause him to come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H977>him:<s%> even him whom he shall choose he will cause to come near to <S%H7126>him.<s%>
<S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3947>this:<s%> take <S%H4289>censers,<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and all his <S%H5712>company;<s%>

and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H2004>them,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow:<s%> and it shall be that the <S%H376>man<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H977>chooses,<s%> he shall be <S%H6918>holy.<s%> You have gone too <S%H7227>far,<s%> you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi!<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H1121>now,<s%> you sons of <S%H3878>Levi!<s%>

Is it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> to <S%H430>you,<s%> that the God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to bring you <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H5647>himself,<s%> to do the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to minister to <S%H8334>them;<s%>
and that he has brought you <S%H7126>near,<s%> and all your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> with <S%H1245>you?<s%> and do you seek the priesthood <S%H3550>also?<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> you and all your <S%H5712>company<s%> are gathered <S%H3259>together<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> what is he that you murmur against <S%H3885>him?<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H5927>won't<s%> come up:

is it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> you have brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> but you must <S%H8323>also<s%> <S%H8323>make<s%> yourself a prince over <S%H8323>us?<s%>

<S%H637>Moreover<s%> you <S%H935>haven't<s%> brought us into a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> nor <S%H5414>given<s%> us <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards:<s%> will you put <S%H5365>out<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of these <S%H582>men?<s%> We <S%H5927>won't<s%> come up."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6437>"Don't<s%> respect their <S%H4503>offering:<s%> I have not <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2543>donkey<s%> from <S%H7489>them,<s%> neither have I hurt one of <S%H259>them.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> "You and all your <S%H5712>company<s%> go <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H175>you,<s%> and they, and Aaron, <S%H4279>tomorrow:<s%>

and each <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on <S%H376>them,<s%> and each man <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4289>censers;<s%> you <S%H175>also,<s%> and Aaron, <S%H376>each<s%> his <S%H4289>censer.<s%>"

They <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H7760>them,<s%> and laid <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5975>thereon,<s%> and stood at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

<S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> against them to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to all the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H914>"Separate<s%> yourselves from <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them in a <S%H7281>moment!<s%>"

They <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God,<s%> the <S%H410>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> shall <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and will you be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with all the <S%H5712>congregation?<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'Get away from <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram!<s%>'"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram;<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310>him.<s%>

He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5493>"Depart,<s%> <S%H168>please,<s%> from the tents of these <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H5060>touch<s%> nothing of <S%H5595>theirs,<s%> lest you be consumed in all their <S%H2403>sins!<s%>"

So they <S%H5927>went<s%> away from the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> on every <S%H5439>side:<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5324>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their little <S%H2945>ones.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Hereby you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H4639>works;<s%> for they are not from my own <S%H3820>mind.<s%>

If these men <S%H4191>die<s%> the common <S%H4194>death<s%> of all <S%H120>men,<s%> or if they be <S%H6485>visited<s%> after the <S%H6486>visitation<s%> of all <S%H120>men;<s%> then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>hasn't<s%> sent me.

But if <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1254>make<s%> a new <S%H1278>thing,<s%> and the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallow them <S%H1104>up,<s%> with all that appertain to <S%H3381>them,<s%> and they go down <S%H2416>alive<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> then you shall <S%H3045>understand<s%> that these <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H5006>despised<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
It <S%H3615>happened,<s%> as he made an end of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> that the <S%H127>ground<s%> split apart that was under <S%H1234>them;<s%>

and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallowed them <S%H1104>up,<s%> and their <S%H1004>households,<s%> and all the <S%H120>men<s%> who appertained to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and all their <S%H7399>goods.<s%>

So <S%H3381>they,<s%> and all that appertained to them, went down <S%H2416>alive<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol:<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3680>closed<s%> on <S%H6>them,<s%> and they perished from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>
All <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H5439>around<s%> them <S%H5127>fled<s%> at their <S%H6963>cry;<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Lest the <S%H776>earth<s%> swallow us <S%H1104>up!<s%>"

<S%H784>Fire<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H7126>offered<s%> the <S%H7004>incense.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Speak<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that he take <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H4289>censers<s%> <S%H996>out<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning,<s%> and <S%H2219>scatter<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1973>yonder;<s%> for they are <S%H6942>holy,<s%>

even the <S%H4289>censers<s%> of these <S%H2400>sinners<s%> against their own <S%H5315>lives;<s%> and let them be <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7555>beaten<s%> <S%H6341>plates<s%> for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> for they <S%H7126>offered<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> therefore they are <S%H6942>holy;<s%> and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4289>censers,<s%> which those who were <S%H8313>burnt<s%> had <S%H7126>offered;<s%> and they <S%H7554>beat<s%> them out for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%>

to be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the end <S%H834>that<s%> no <S%H376>stranger,<s%> who <S%H2233>isn't<s%> of the seed of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> comes <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> that he not be as <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and as his <S%H5712>company:<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

But on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You have <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5971>people!<s%>"

It <S%H5712>happened,<s%> when the congregation was <S%H6950>assembled<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and <S%H6051>behold,<s%> the cloud <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H3519>it,<s%> and the glory of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6440>the<s%> front of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Get <S%H7426>away<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them in a <S%H7281>moment!<s%>" They <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> your <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H6440>off<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H7760>it,<s%> and lay <S%H7004>incense<s%> on <S%H3212>it,<s%> and carry it <S%H4120>quickly<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H7110>them;<s%> for wrath has gone <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> The <S%H5063>plague<s%> has <S%H2490>begun.<s%>"

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>did<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>said,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly;<s%> and <S%H5063>behold,<s%> the plague has <S%H2490>begun<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and made <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
He <S%H5975>stood<s%> between the <S%H4191>dead<s%> and the <S%H2416>living;<s%> and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed.<s%>

Now those who <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H4046>plague<s%> were <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> besides those who <S%H4191>died<s%> about the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%>
<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed.<s%>
